title: Evaluating LLM Abilities to Understand Tabular Electronic Health Records: A Comprehensive Study of Patient Data Extraction and Retrieval
details: J Lovon, M Mouysset, J Oleiwan, JG Moreno… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Electronic Health Record (EHR) tables pose unique challenges among which is the presence of hidden contextual dependencies between medical features with a high level of data dimensionality and sparsity. This study presents the first investigation …
